algorithm_technique: Sliding window with frequency count for bitwise OR.
problem_summary_simple: Find the shortest subarray whose bitwise OR of elements is at least k.
problem_summary_technical: Employs a sliding window and bit frequency counts to efficiently track the OR sum of subarrays.
key_insights: The bitwise OR property allows for an efficient sliding window approach.
Tracking the count of each bit within the window is key to updating the OR sum.
The constraint on `nums.length` suggests an O(n) or O(n log r) solution.
